channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Simple Task Managing System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Simple Task Managing System

item.title: CVE-2022-3013|2024-08-03T00:53:00.653Z -- sourcecodester -- simple%20task%20managing%20system
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in SourceCodester Simple Task Managing System. This affects an unknown part of the file /loginVaLidation.php. The manipulation of the argument login leads to sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-207423.

item.title: CVE-2022-3014|2024-08-03T00:53:00.513Z -- sourcecodester -- simple%20task%20managing%20system
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in SourceCodester Simple Task Managing System. This vulnerability affects unknown code. The manipulation of the argument student_add leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-207424.
